short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps the main menu and search bar of popular websites from disappearing when you scroll down.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does the menu and/or the search bar disappear once you scroll down on your favourite website?

That's pretty annoying right?
It doesn't have have to be anymore.

This Fixed-Header extension allows you to pin the websites' main header so its always visible.

No more flash scrolling all the way back to the top of the page, just to click a link or to search with the search bar!

Fixed-Header also allows you to hide the header while you are scrolling down and make it visible to you once again as soon as you start to scroll back up! ( my people in Android land know what I'm talking about ;-D )

----------------------------------------------------
If you don't see your favourite website in the list, you can press the "Request This Site" button to let us know so we can add it for you :-)

You can also report a website that is in the list but not working anymore.
Websites are updated by their creators fairly often and sometimes those updates might break the way our extension works, so we need your help to know when something changes ;-)
